about_the_game:
Triplane Furball, the spiritual successor to the classic Finnish dogfighting game Triplane Turmoil, invites you to conquer the skies! Pilot your triplane, armed with guns and bombs, in thrilling aerial combat. Experience four challenging single-player campaigns that put your skills to the test. Engage in intense 4-player skirmishes against human or AI opponents. Get ready for high-flying action and prove your dominance in Triplane Furball!

INTENSE DOGFIGHTS
  • Best 2D flying experience
  • 4 Single player campaigns
  • Customizable 1-4 player skirmish battles
  • Local Multiplayer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP (sp2) or later
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz Dual Core Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA since 2006 (GeForce 8), AMD since 2006 (Radeon HD 2000), Intel since 2012 (HD 4000 / IvyBridge)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Prepare for intense dogfights in Triplane Furball, a 2D aerial combat game. Conquer singleplayer campaigns or engage in customizable multiplayer battles against friends. Skill, precision, and lightning-fast reflexes are key to victory!
